channel.title: yum on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in yum on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Soup Plantation
item.description: 20:47 Monday 25 January 2016 PST Just ate at Soup Plantation with Elise, Adam, and their kids,.. successfully returning their Death Star shaped maze, eating a lot of salad and stuff, plus being entertained by the kids.

item.title: Taiyaki Hiiragi, Afiru ramen, Ouca ice cream, and Baskin Robbins in Ebisu with Joanna and Eric
item.description: 20:33 Sunday 10 January 2016 JST Title says it all, but actually I was the only one who ate at 31. I had Vani Vani Vanilla, but it wasn’t as good as Popping Shower. Taiyaki Hiiragi are the azuki bean filled pastries, … and they were full. The ramen shop tasted like ramen to me, but it had come twice recommended to Joanna. Ouca ice cream was served with salty seaweed, which I thought was gross.

item.title: Hello CoCo Curry and electrical outlet
item.description: 14:04 Wednesday 25 November 2015 JST Yay! Free electricity, free place to sit, and veggie curry for only 600 something yen. Thanks, CoCo Ichiban Curry!

item.title: super dinner at Paola and Jon's
item.description: ##22:13 Saturday 27 December 2014 JST## Lin and I went to Paola’s for dinner with some cool peeps including Jas, Rob, Rio, Ryo, and Tomoko. Ryo and Tomoko brought their rabbit, Nana; Rio brought a box of tissues. Rob works with Jon who had to work a bit during the evening. Food, of course, was amazing, and I tried amaretto for the first time. Pretty yummy!
